gocardless_environment.description: Environment you are trying to connect to should be one of [live, sandbox]

gocardless_version.description: Gocardless version, it is a date, you can find the latest here https://developer.gocardless.com/api-reference/#api-usage-making-requests

start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

lookback_window_days.title: Lookback Window (in days)
lookback_window_days.description: When set, the connector will always reload data from the past N days, where N is the value set here. This is useful if your data is updated after creation.
